array.name: AboveAndBeyond
array.item: "Each time this model scores a goal, this model gains [+1/+0] INF for the remainder of the game."

array.name: AnatomicalPrecision
array.item: "During an Attack from this model enemy models suffer [-1] ARM."

array.name: AnimosityHonour
array.item: "This model cannot be affected by friendly Character Traits from the named model."

array.name: AssistPrincess
array.item: "When making an Attack against an enemy model engaged by the named model, this model gains [+1] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: AssistMarbles
array.item: "When making an Attack against an enemy model engaged by the named model, this model gains [+1] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: AssistVenin
array.item: "When making an Attack against an enemy model engaged by the named model, this model gains [+1] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: AttackSupportPrincess
array.item: "This model gains [+2] TAC while within [4\"] of the named friendly model."

array.name: BackToTheShadows
array.item: "At the end of its activation, if this model caused damage to an enemy model during the activation, this model may make a [4\"] Dodge."

array.name: BagOfCoffers
array.item: "Once per turn target friendly non-[Captain] Guild model within [4\"] is allocated [1] Influence. The target model may use Bonus Time! once during its activation without spending MP."

array.name: BagOfQuaffers
array.item: "Once per turn target friendly non-[Captain] Guild model within [4\"] gains [+1] TAC until the end of the turn."

array.name: Beserk
array.item: "During its activation, if this model damages an enemy model with an Attack, this model may make an additional Attack without spending Influence. This ability cannot generate a further additional Attack from itself."

array.name: BloodDance
array.item: "When this model damages one or more enemy models suffering the bleed condition with a Playbook damage result, it may make a [1\"] Dodge."

array.name: Beautiful
array.item: "Enemy Character Plays directly targeting this model suffer [-5\"] RNG."

array.name: Benched
array.item: "This model cannot be selected for a team but is automatically added when the named friendly model is selected for a team. This model does not count towards your maximum team size allowance."

array.name: BigGameTraps
array.item: "Once per turn during this model’s activation, the Controlling Player may place a friendly 30mm trapmarker within [2\"] of this model. A Player may have up to [3] friendly trap-markers on the Pitch at once. When an enemy model moves within [1\"] of a friendly trapmarker, that model immediately suffers the snared condition and the trap-marker is removed."

array.name: BreakingPlay
array.item: "After this model has finished its activation this turn, other friendly Guild models within [4\"] gain [+1] DEF against enemy Character Plays."

array.name: BurningEffigy
array.item: "While this model is suffering the burning condition it gains [+2] TAC and [+2\"/+2\"] MOV."

array.name: BurningPassion
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results while targeting an enemy model that is suffering the burning condition."

array.name: BurningSpirit
array.item: "Enemy models entering or starting their activation in this aura suffer the burning condition."

array.name: BurningStrike
array.item: "When damaged by this model enemy models suffer the burning condition."

array.name: CharmedMale
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DEF against each Attack or Character Play made against it by the named model type."

array.name: ChemicalFrenzy
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results when targeting an enemy model suffering at least one condition."

array.name: CloseControl
array.item: "Once per turn this model may ignore the first Tackle Playbook result against it."

array.name: CloudJumper
array.item: "Once per turn during its activation, this model may choose an ongoing-effect AOE within [4\"]. This model may be placed anywhere within the chosen ongoing-effect AOE."

array.name: CounterCharge
array.item: "Once per turn when an enemy model ends an Advance within [6\"] of this model, if this model is not engaged this model may immediately make a Charge targeting the enemy model."

array.name: CoverOfDarkness
array.item: "If this model starts an Advance while benefiting from cover it gains [+2\"/+2\"] MOV."

array.name: Motivated
array.item: "While within [6\"] of a friendly model of the named type this model gains Shadow Like. (At the start of this model’s activation it may make a [2\"] Dodge.)"

array.name: Crazy
array.item: "Once per turn during its activation, this model may suffer [3] DMG to gain [+3] TAC for the remainder of the turn."

array.name: Fixer
array.item: "Once per turn remove all conditions from target friendly [Mechanica] model that is within 4\" of this model."

array.name: CrucialArtery
array.item: "When damaged by this model enemy models suffer the bleed condition."

array.name: AssistDirge
array.item: "When making an Attack against an enemy model engaged by the named model, this model gains [+1] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: DamagedTarget
array.item: "When this model declares a Charge against a damaged enemy model it gains [+0\"/2\"] MOV for the duration of the Charge."

array.name: DarkDoubts
array.item: "If this model suffers the taken–out condition as a result of an enemy Attack or Play, the enemy team suffers [–2] MP after resolving the Attack or Play."

array.name: DefenceSupportKraken
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains +1 DEF."

array.name: DefenseSupportSalt
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains +1 DEF."

array.name: DefenceSupportSpigot
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains +1 DEF."

array.name: InSyncAvarisse
array.item: "While within [6\"] of the named friendly model, this model may spend the named friendly model\'s Influence during its activation."

array.name: DetachGreede
array.item: "During this model’s activation, if the named friendly model is not on the Pitch and is not suffering the taken-out condition, the named friendly model may be placed on the Pitch in base contact with this model. If this model is in possession of the ball-marker, it may give possession of the ball-marker to the named friendly model."

array.name: ReattachAvarisse
array.item: "At the start of this model’s activation, if this model is in base contact with the named friendly model, it may remove all conditions and remove itself from the Pitch. If this model is in possession of the ball-marker, the named friendly model gains possession of the ball-marker."

array.name: ContractGreede
array.item: "While the named friendly model is on the Pitch, this model activates simultaneously with the named friendly model."

array.name: ManyHands
array.item: "While the named friendly model is not suffering the taken-out condition and is not on the Pitch, when this model makes a successful Attack add an additional Tackle Playbook result."

array.name: Deteriorating
array.item: "At the end of this model\'s activation this model suffers the stated DMG."

array.name: DrainedTrueReplication
array.item: "While this model has the named Character Play its INF is increased by [+0/+1]."

array.name: EmpoweredVoice
array.item:
"Once per turn during this model's activation, choose a friendly guild model within [6"] to benefit from one of the following Empowered Voice effects. The chosen effect lasts until the end of the turn:

Speed: gain [+2"/+2"] MOV.
Strength: gain [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results.
Agility: gain [+1] DEF."

array.name: ElementalInfusion
array.item:
"If this model makes an Attack against an enemy model that is suffering from one or more of the following conditions, the following cumulative benefits apply to the Attack against that model:
Burning: [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results.
Poison:[+2] TAC.
Bleed: Target model suffers [-1] ARM."

array.name: EscapingFate
array.item: "Once per turn when this model is reduced to [0] HP, except while making an Advance, before suffering the taken-out condition this model may recover [1] HP, remove all conditions, and make a [4\"] Dodge."

array.name: ExtendedReach
array.item: "During its activation this model’s melee zone is [3\"]."

array.name: FamilyHonour
array.item: "If this model starts an activation within [8\"] of the named friendly model, this model may replace itsTAC and KICK with the named model’s values for the remainder of the turn."

array.name: Fear
array.item: "The first time each turn an enemy model spends Influence on an Attack, Charge or Character Play that targets this model, the cost of the Attack, Charge or Character Play is increased by [1] Influence."

array.name: Floored
array.item: "When this model targets an enemy model that is suffering from the knocked-down condition with an Attack, this model gains [+2] TAC for the duration of the Attack."

array.name: Flying
array.item: "When this model moves it ignores other model\'s bases, terrain and ground. It cannot end its movement overlapping another base or barrier terrain."

array.name: FlyKeeper
array.item: "During the Maintenance Phase, this model may choose to lose Goal Defence and Hundred Hand Stance and gain [+1\"/+1\"] MOV and Unpredictable Movement for the remainder of the turn.(Unpredictable Movement: Once per turn when an enemy model ends an Advance in this model’s melee zone, this model may immediately make a [2\"] Dodge.)"

array.name: FollowUp
array.item: "When an enemy model ends an Advance that caused it to leave this model\'s melee zone, this model may immediately make a Jog directly towards that model."

array.name: FootballLegend
array.item: "While within this aura, friendly Guild models gain [+1/+1\"] KICK."

array.name: FoulOdour
array.item: "Other models within the aura treat open–ground as rough–ground."

array.name: ForcefulBlow
array.item: "During a Charge, in addition to one or more Playbook damage results, the targeted enemy model suffers a [2\"] Push directly away from this model and [2] DMG."

array.name: ForestSight
array.item: "This model ignores forest terrain while drawing LOS."

array.name: Furious
array.item: "This model may Charge without spending Influence."

array.name: GetOverHereScum
array.item: "Once during this model’s activation, if the named friendly model is within [10\"] of this model, the named friendly model may make a Dodge up to its base-move towards this model."

array.name: GetOverHereSalt
array.item: "Once during this model’s activation, if the named friendly model is within [10\"] of this model, the named friendly model may make a Dodge up to its base-move towards this model."

array.name: GoalDefence
array.item: "Enemy models suffer [+1] TN to Shots while this model is within [4\"] of a friendly goal-post."

array.name: GluttonousMass
array.item: "The first time each turn this model is hit by an enemy Attack or Character Play that targets this model, except while making an Advance, the Attack or Character Play is ignored."

array.name: GoApe
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named friendly model this model gains Counter Charge. (Once per turn when an enemy model ends an Advance within [6\"] of this model, if this model is not engaged this model may immediately make a Charge targeting the enemy model)."

array.name: Hooked
array.item: "When an enemy model suffers damage from a Playbook damage result from this model, the enemy model suffers [-1] DEF for the remainder of the turn."

array.name: HundredHandStance
array.item: "While this model is within [4\"] of the friendly goalpost, immediately after an enemy model fails a Shot, this model may gain possession of the ball-marker."

array.name: HuntersPrey
array.item: "When damaged by this model enemy models suffer the snared condition."

array.name: IsolatedTarget
array.item: "This model gains [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results while targeting an enemy model suffering the snared condition."

array.name: IntimidatingRoar
array.item: "At the start of this model’s activation, choose an enemy model within this model’s melee zone. The enemy model immediately suffers a [2\"] Push directly away from this model."

array.name: KickSupportDirge
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named friendly model this model gains [+1/+1\"] KICK."

array.name: Knockback
array.item: "In addition to any successful Attack or Character Play, the target enemy model suffers a [1\"] Push directly away from this model. This model may then make a [1\"] Dodge directly towards the affected enemy model."

array.name: Haemophilia
array.item: "During the Maintenance Phase, this model heals [1] HP for each enemy model within this aura that suffers bleed condition damage."

array.name: HiddenDamage
array.item: "Once per turn, when this model declares an Attack or Charge against a model benefitting from cover, this model may choose to gain [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results for the duration of the Attack."

array.name: LaunchControl
array.item: "Once per turn this model may use Long Bomb and make a Pass without spending Influence during its activation."

array.name: LifeDrinker
array.item: "When this model damages one or more enemy models with a Playbook damage result, it may recover [1] HP."

array.name: LightFooted
array.item: "When this model makes an Advance it ignores the MOV penalty for rough-ground."

array.name: LinkedHarmony
array.item: "When this model’s activation ends, the named friendly model may take its activation next if able to do so."

array.name: LinkedZarola
array.item: "When this model’s activation ends, the named friendly model may take its activation next if able to do so."

array.name: LinkedFahad
array.item: "When this model’s activation ends, the named friendly model may take its activation next if able to do so."

array.name: LongLegs
array.item: "If this model starts its activation, or moves within [2\"] of a free-ball, it may choose to take possession of the ballmarker. If the ball-marker is placed within [2\"] of this model, it may choose to take possession of the ball-marker."

array.name: LovedCreature
array.item: "When this model suffers damage from an enemy Attack or Play, except while making an Advance, other friendly Guild models gain [+1] TAC for the remainder of the turn."

array.name: MagicalBrew
array.item: "At the start of this model’s activation, remove all conditions from this model. This model also recovers [2] HP."

array.name: MatchFit
array.item: "While in possession of the ball-marker, this model gains [+2\"/+2\"] MOV."

array.name: Maverick
array.item: "This model cannot be affected by other friendly model\'s Plays or Character Traits."

array.name: MobFavourite
array.item: "If this model uses a Character Play to inflict the takenout condition on an enemy model, the friendly team gains an additional [+1] VP."

array.name: MomentousInspiration
array.item: "While within this aura, friendly models that generate one or more successful hits when using a Character Play that causes damage, additionally generate [1] MP."

array.name: MudConcealer
array.item: "While within rough-ground this model gains [+1] ARM."

array.name: NaturesBlessing
array.item: "Once per turn during its activation, this model may choose a piece of forest terrain within [4\"]. This model may be placed anywhere within the chosen forest terrain."

array.name: NaturesGrowth
array.item: "At the start of this model’s activation, the Controlling Player may place a [3\"] AOE within [8\"] of this model. This AOE may not be placed within [2\"] of another terrain piece. This AOE is forest terrain. This AOE is removed in the End Phase."

array.name: NoxiousDeath
array.item: "When this model suffers the taken-out condition during the Activation Phase, all other models within the pulse suffer [3] DMG and the poison condition."

array.name: OffensiveDefense
array.item: "The first time this model scores a goal, this model gains [+1] DEF for the remainder of the game."

array.name: FootballDervish
array.item: "When a friendly model receives a successful Pass from this model, the friendly model may immediately spend [1] MP to make a Pass that targets this model instead of making a Teamwork action."

array.name: Overheat
array.item: "When this model suffers the taken-out condition during the Activation Phase, all other models within the pulse suffer [3] DMG and the burning condition."

array.name: PainfulRage
array.item: "If this model is below the specified HP, this model gains [+2] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: PaintOnYourBoots
array.item: "While within 8\" of the edge of the Pitch this model gains Poised. (Once per turn, this model may make a Counter-Attack without spending MP.)"

array.name: PitFall
array.item: "Once per turn during this model’s activation, the Controlling Player may place a friendly 40mm pitfall-marker within [2\"] of this model. A Player may only have [1] friendly pitfall-marker on the Pitch. When an enemy model moves within [1\"] of a friendly pitfall-marker, that model immediately suffers the snared and bleed conditions and the pitfall-marker is removed."

array.name: Poised
array.item: "Once per turn, this model may make a Counter Attack without spending MP."

array.name: PoisonousFumes
array.item: "Enemy models entering or starting their activation in this aura suffer the poison condition."

array.name: ProtectedBrick
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains [+1] ARM."

array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains [+1] ARM."

array.name: ProtectedKraken
array.item: "While within [4\"] of the named model, this model gains [+1] ARM."

array.name: Webbing
array.item: "Once per turn during this model’s activation if there is a friendly nest-marker within 2\" of a free-ball, this model may remove that nest-marker from the Pitch to gain possession of the ball-marker."

array.name: Pumped
array.item: "Once per turn during its activation, this model may use Bonus Time! without spending MP."

array.name: Pyromaniac
array.item: "This model starts the game suffering the burning condition. During the End Phase this model suffers the burning condition."

array.name: Reanimate
array.item: "Once per turn when this model is reduced to [0] HP, before suffering the taken-out condition, recover [3] HP and remove all conditions."

array.name: ContractAvarisse
array.item: "While the named friendly model is on the Pitch, this model activates simultaneously with the named friendly model."

array.name: Regenerate
array.item: "At the start of the Maintenance Phase, before conditions are resolved, this model may recover [2] HP."

array.name: Resolute
array.item: "When this model targets an enemy model with a Counter-Attack, this model gains [+2] TAC for the duration of the Counter-Attack."

array.name: ResponsivePlay
array.item: "Once per turn when an enemy model ends an Advance in this model’s melee zone and LOS, this model may immediately make an Attack against that model."

array.name: RisingAnger
array.item: "The first time this model is damaged by an enemy model each turn, the friendly team gains [2] MP."

array.name: Rollerball
array.item: "At the start of this model\'s activation it may choose to gain [+2\"/+2\"] MOV. If it does so, it may use Ramming Speed without spending Influence but cannot make Attacks. Rollerball lasts until the end of the turn."

array.name: RushKeeper
array.item: "While this model is within [4\"] of a friendly goal-post, when an enemy model ends an Advance within [6\"] of this model and this model is not engaged, this model may immediately make a Charge targeting the enemy model. Rush Keeper may only be triggered once per turn."

array.name: ShellingOut
array.item: "Friendly Guild models gain [+1] TAC when making an Attack against an enemy model that is within this aura. When a friendly model inflicts the taken-out condition on an enemy model that is within this aura, the friendly team gains an additional [1] MP."

array.name: ShadowLike
array.item: "At the start of this model’s activation it may make a [2\"] Dodge."

array.item: "This model spends [1] less MP to make Teamwork actions."

array.name: SmellBlood
array.item: "This model gains [+0\"/+2\"] MOV when it performs a Charge against an enemy model suffering the bleed condition. When this model makes an Attack against an enemy model suffering the bleed condition, it gains [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results against that model."

array.name: SmokeCloud
array.item: "Once per turn during this model’s activation, you may place a [3\"] AOE over the centre of this model. Models within this ongoing-effect AOE benefit from cover."

array.name: SpiderNests
array.item: "Once per turn during this model\'s activation, the Controlling Player may place a friendly 30mm nestmarker within [4\"] of this model. Enemy models suffer [-1] die on TN tests while within 1\" of one or more friendly nest-markers. A Player may have up to [3] friendly nest-markers on the Pitch at once."

array.name: Stoic

array.item: "This model may make a [1\"] Dodge after causing damage to one or more enemy models."

array.item: Once per turn after a friendly model ends an Advance that that caused it to leave this model\'s melee zone, this model may immediately make a Jog directly towards that model.

array.name: TeamPlayer
array.item: While within this aura, when a friendly Guild model suffers damage, this model may suffer the damage instead.

array.name: ThatsNotTheBall
array.item: An enemy model engaged by this model must pay [1] additional Influence to make a Kick.

array.item: Enemy Plays that cause damage to, or Playbook damage results that hit this model are reduced by [–1] DMG.

array.item: "Once per turn when an enemy model ends an Advance in this model\’s melee zone, this model may immediately make a [2\"] Dodge."

array.item: "Target other friendly model within [6\"]. Once during its activation that model may use a COST [3] or less Character Play without spending Influence."

array.name: CreationMainspring

array.item: "If the friendly named model is suffering the taken-out condition, remove the taken-out condition from the friendly named model and place it in base contact with this model with full HP. The friendly named model can activate as normal."

array.name: WitnessMe
array.item: "If this model inflicts the taken-out condition on an enemy model, this model may immediately suffer the taken-out condition and reduce its HP to [0]. The friendly team gains an additional [+2] VP."

array.name: HumanBallOfFire

array.name: SwiftWind
array.item: "When this model performs an Advance it may pass over other model\'s bases. It cannot end its movement overlapping another model\'s base. This model ignores the movement penalty while moving through rough-ground."

array.name: TimesCalled
array.item: "When a friendly Guild model starts an Advance within this aura, it gains [+2\"/+2\"] MOV.

array.name: TridentTested
array.item: "Enemy models within the pulse suffer a [4\"] Push directly away from this model."

array.name: TrueGrit
array.item: "Immediately remove all conditions from this model. This model gains [+2] TAC.

array.name: UnnaturalStamina
array.item: The next time this model uses Second Wind this turn it does so without spending Influence.

array.name: CasketTime
array.item: "The next time this model inflicts the taken–out condition on an enemy [Human] model, the friendly team scores an additional [+2] VPs. In addition, the model which suffered the taken–out condition may not return to the Pitch in the next Maintenance Phase. "

array.name: CaughtInANet
array.item: "Enemy models within the pulse suffer [-4\"/-4\"] MOV."

array.name: ChemicalShower
array.item: "Position two [3\"] AOEs within [8\"] of this model. Models within one or more of these AOEs immediately suffer [3] condition damage. Models entering or ending their activation in either of these ongoing-effect AOEs suffer the poison condition."

array.name: Exsanguinate
array.item: "Enemy models suffering the bleed condition within the pulse immediately suffer [3] condition-damage."

array.name: ItsNotOverUntil
array.item: "This model may use Empowered Voice three times this turn."

array.name: GetEmLads
array.item: "While within this aura friendly Guild models gain [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results. Enemy models within this aura suffer [-1] ARM."

array.name: MagnumOpus
array.item: "When this model scores a goal, enemy models within [4\"] of this model suffer the snared condition."

array.name: Breach
array.item: "During its activation, this model gains [+0/+4\"] KICK and may make a Kick without spending Influence. When this model makes a Kick, the Kick ignores intervening models, cannot be intercepted, and all other models, except the receiving model, on the ball-path suffer the knocked-down condition."

array.name: MyGang
array.item: "While within this aura friendly models gain [+1] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results when making an Attack against an enemy model that is engaged by one or more other friendly models. My Gang is not cumulative with Bloody Coin."

array.name: OneLegStance
array.item: "While within this aura friendly Guild models gain [+1/+2\"] KICK and Close Control."

array.name: Pseudoepigraphy
array.item: "Each time this model spends Influence, it may generate [1] MP per Influence spent. Up to [3] MP may be generated this way."

array.name: RigorMortis
array.item: "The enemy team lose all current MP. The friendly team gains MP equal to the MP loss caused by this action. This Legendary Play does not last until the end of the turn."

array.name: StrikeFromTheShadow
array.item: "Choose either [+1] DEF or immediately making a [2\"] Dodge. Friendly Guild models within the pulse gain the chosen benefit."

array.name: ToppingOut
array.item: "Choose either [+1] ARM or [1] Influence. Friendly Guild models within the pulse gain the chosen benefit."

array.name: WellOiledMachine
array.item: "Place an oil-token on each friendly [Mechanica] model. When a friendly [Mechanica] model receives a successful Pass, it may remove its oil-token to immediately make a Pass action without spending Influence. A model may not remove an oil-token after using a Teamwork Momentous action. Each unspent oil-token is removed at the end of the turn."

array.name: VoodooStrings
array.item: "Enemy models within the pulse immediately suffer a [3\"] Push directly towards this model."

array.name: AlchemyMix
array.item: "Choose an ongoing-effect AOE that was positioned by a friendly model. Position a new [3\"] ongoing-effect AOE in contact with the chosen AOE. The new AOE is a duplicate of the chosen ongoing-effect AOE."

array.name: Alternator
array.item: "Target friendly [Mechanica] model gains [+2\"/+2\"] MOV. At the end of target model\'s activation it suffers [2] DMG."

array.name: ArrowToTheKnee
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-2/-2”] KICK and [2] DMG."

array.name: BallHog
array.item: "Target other friendly model with at least [1] Influence loses [1] Influence. This model gains [+1/+0] KICK."

array.name: BallsGone
array.item: "Target enemy model loses possession of the ball-marker and the ball-marker is placed in possession of this model. This model may immediately make a Pass without spending Influence."

array.name: BearHug
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [4] DMG and the bleed condition. If this model inflicts the taken-out condition using this Character Play, the friendly team gains an additional [1] VP."

array.name: BlastEarth
array.item: "All models hit suffer [2] DMG. This ongoing-effect AOE is rough-ground."

array.name: Blind
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-2] TAC, [-2/-2\"] KICK and [-2\"/-2\"] MOV. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: Blood
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers the bleed condition"

array.name: BloodRain
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [2] DMG. Enemy models within the pulse suffer the bleed condition."

array.name: BoomBox
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [4] DMG and a [4\"] Push directly away from this model."

array.name: BurnTheFloor
array.item: "Choose a terrain piece. All models within the terrain piece automatically suffer the burning condition. All models entering or ending their activation within the terrain piece suffer the burning condition."

array.name: Burrow
array.item: "Choose a friendly nest-marker. Place this model in base contact with the nest-marker then remove the nest-marker from the Pitch. This model may then immediately make an Attack without spending Influence."

array.name: Butchery
array.item: "Friendly models gain [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results against the target enemy model."

array.name: ChainBolas
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [2] DMG and the snared condition."

array.name: ChainGrab
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [6\"] Push directly towards this model."

array.name: ChemicalBreeze
array.item: "Choose an ongoing-effect AOE that was positioned by a friendly model. The chosen AOE may be positioned within[4\"] of its current location. Models within the AOE when it is positioned are considered to have entered the AOE. This Character Play may only be used once on eachongoing-effect AOE per turn."

array.name: ChemicalResist
array.item: "Target friendly model ignores the first poison or burning condition it receives this turn.

array.name: Clone
array.item: "The next time this model is hit by an enemy Attack or Character Play that targets this model, except while making an Advance, the Attack or Character Play is ignored. This model then makes a [2\"] Dodge."

array.name: CommandingAura
array.item: While within this aura friendly Guild models gain [+1] TAC and [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results.

array.name: Confidence
array.item: "Target friendly model can reroll one or more dice during its next Attack or Character Play during its activation."

array.name: Controller
array.item: "Target friendly [Mechanica] model. When this model\'s activation ends, if the target model has not activated this turn it may take its activation next, if able to do so. At the end of target model’s activation it suffers [2] DMG."

array.name: Deadbolt
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [2\"] Push directly away from this model, the knocked-down condition and [3] DMG."

array.name: DefendTheGround
array.item: "While within this ongoing-effect AOE, friendly Guild models may use Defensive Stance without spending MP."

array.name: Decoy
array.item: "This model gains [+2] DEF against the next enemy Attack or Character Play."

array.name: Deletion
array.item: "Target friendly [Mechanica] model gains [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results. The target model may also use Bonus Time! once during its activation without spending MP. At the end of the target model\'s activation it suffers [2] DMG."

array.name: DirtyKnives
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-1] DEF, [1] DMG and the poison condition"

array.name: Drag
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [6\"] Push directly towards this model."

array.name: DreadGaze
array.item: "While within the aura enemy models suffer [-2] TAC."

array.name: EmbalmingFluid
array.item: "All models hit suffer [1] DMG and the burning condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the poison condition. This Character Play may only be used once per turn."

array.name: ExternalCombustion
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a 4\" Push directly away from this model and [3] DMG. Enemy models within the pulse suffer the burning condition."

array.name: FeelMyPain
array.item: "If target enemy model makes an Attack targeting this model, after the Attack is resolved the enemy model suffers [2] DMG."

array.name: FireBlast
array.item: "All models hit suffer [2] DMG and the burning condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the burning condition."

array.name: FlameJet
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [3] DMG and the burning condition."

array.name: FlooredBolt
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [1] DMG and the knocked-down condition."

array.name: Flurry
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [2] DMG. All other models within this pulse suffer [2] DMG."

array.name: GhostlyVisage
array.item: "An enemy model suffers [-0\"/-4\"] MOV when it targets a friendly model within this ongoing-effect AOE with a Charge. The enemy model also suffers [-2] TAC for the duration of the Charge."

array.name: Goad
array.item: "While this model is on the Pitch, the target enemy model can only move directly towards this model during an Advance."

array.name: Gravedigger
array.item: "If target enemy model suffers the taken-out condition this turn, the friendly team gains an additional [+1] VP."

array.name: GroundPound
array.item: "All other models within the pulse suffer a [2\"] Push directly away from this model, [2] DMG and the knocked-down condition."

array.name: GutAndString
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-4\"/-4\"] MOV and [-1] DEF."

array.name: Harpoon
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [6\"] Push directly towards this model."

array.name: HeavyBurden
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-4\"/-4\"] MOV and [-2] to their dice-pool on Character Plays."

array.name: HogWild
array.item: "The first time this model suffers damage this turn from an enemy Attack or Character Play, it may immediately make a Jog."

array.name: HorrificOdour
array.item: "While within this aura, enemy models must pay an additional [1] Influence to make a Kick."

array.name: Howzat
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [4\"] Push directly away from this model and the knocked-down condition."

array.name: Hypnosis
array.item: "The first time target enemy model spends Influence on an Attack or Character Play this turn, the cost of the Attack or Character Play is increased by [1] Influence."

array.name: Intensify
array.item: "Enemy models that are suffering conditions and are within the pulse suffer [2] DMG."

array.name: IronFist
array.item: "Target other friendly model with at least [1] Influence loses [1] Influence. This model gains [+1] DMG to Playbook damage results."

array.name: KickBolt
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [3\"] Push directly away from this model and [2] DMG."

array.name: LobBarrel
array.item: "All models hit suffer a [4\"] Push directly away from the centre of the AOE and the knocked-down condition."

array.name: LongBomb
array.item: "When this model makes a Pass it gains [+0/+4\"] KICK for the duration of the action. This Pass cannot be intercepted."

array.name: Lure
array.item: "Target enemy model immediately makes a Jog directly towards this model. The target enemy model is a friendly model during this action."

array.name: LureOfGold
array.item: "Target other friendly Guild model may immediately make a Jog towards this model. Each model may only be moved by Lure of Gold once per turn."

array.name: MarkedTarget
array.item: "A friendly model that declares a Charge against the affected target enemy model gains [+0\"/+2\"] MOV for the duration of the Charge."

array.name: Mediation
array.item: "This model may reroll one or more dice during its next Kick during its activation."

array.name: MeltingBody
array.item: "This model suffers the poison condition and gains [+1] ARM."

array.name: MidasTouch
array.item: "Target enemy model gains a burden-token. When a friendly Guild model makes an Attack against an enemy model that has a burden-token, the friendly Guild model may remove the burden-token to gain [+2] net hits."

array.name: MidnightOffering
array.item: "Target friendly model may immediately make a Jog."

array.name: Minefield
array.item: "Enemy models starting an Advance within this aura or entering this aura as part of an Advance suffer [4] DMG. This aura only triggers once per Advance."

array.name: Misdirection
array.item: "Target enemy model with at least [1] Influence loses [1] Influence. Immediately allocate [1] Influence to an other friendly Guild model within [4\"] of this model."

array.name: Molotov
array.item: "All models hit suffer the burning condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the burning condition."

array.name: NoxiousBlast
array.item: "All models hit suffer [2] DMG and the poison condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the poison condition."

array.name: PainCircle
array.item: "All models hit suffer [1] DMG and the bleed condition. Models entering or ending their activation in this ongoing-effect AOE suffer the bleed condition."

array.name: Pinned
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [2] DMG. While this model is on the Pitch, the target enemy model can only move directly towards this model during an Advance."

array.name: PunishingMarch
array.item: "Target other friendly model with at least [1] Influence loses [1] Influence. This model gains [+2\"/+2\"] MOV."

array.name: PuppetMaster
array.item: "Target model immediately makes a Jog, Pass or Attack without spending Influence. If the target model is an enemy model, it is a friendly model during this action."

array.name: QuickTime
array.item: "Target friendly model may make a [2\"] Dodge."

array.name: RammingSpeed
array.item: "During an Advance made by this model, any enemy model whose base is touched by this model’s base suffers a [2\"] Push directly away from this model. A model can only be affected by this Character Play once per turn."

array.name: RabidAnimal
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-4\"/-4\"] MOV and the poison condition"

array.name: RedFury
array.item: "Target friendly model may immediately make an Attack without spending Influence."

array.name: ReleaseThe
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers a [6\"] Push directly away from this model, the knocked-down condition and [3] DMG."

array.name: RoughSeas
array.item: "Target enemy model loses possession of the ball-marker and the ball-marker is placed in possession of this model."

array.name: SacrificialPuppet
array.item: "This model suffers [1] DMG. The next time this model would suffer damage from a Playbook damage result, target enemy model suffers the damage instead."

array.name: Sadism
array.item: "When an enemy model within the aura suffers damage, this model may recover [1] HP."

array.name: Skewered
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [3] DMG and the snared condition."

array.name: ScreechingBanshee
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-1] DEF and [2] DMG."

array.name: ScythingBlow
array.item: "All models within this model\'s melee zone suffer [3] DMG."

array.name: SecondWind
array.item: "When target friendly model next ends an activation it may make a Jog."

array.name: Seduced
array.item: "Target enemy model either makes a Pass or Attack without spending Influence. The target enemy model is a friendly model during this action."

array.name: SeismicKick
array.item: "This model may make a Kick during its activation without spending Influence. When this model makes a Kick it cannot be intercepted. All other models, except the receiving model, on the ball-path from this Kick suffer the knocked-down condition."

array.name: Shutout
array.item: "If target enemy model has not activated this turn, it must be the last model the enemy team activates."

array.name: OnMyMark
array.item: "Target other friendly model may immediately make a Pass without spending Influence."

array.name: SingledOut
array.item: "Friendly models gain [+2] TAC against target enemy model."

array.name: SmellingSalts
array.item: "Friendly models within the AOE remove any conditions currently on them."

array.name: SmokeBomb
array.item: "Models within this ongoing-effect AOE benefit from cover."

array.name: StandFirm
array.item: "Target friendly model gains Sturdy (Once per turn this model may ignore the first knocked-down condition placed upon it). "

array.name: SunStrike
array.item: "Once during its activation, target friendly Guild model may generate [1] MP from a successful Character Play that targets an enemy model."

array.name: SuperiorStrategy
array.item: "Target friendly Guild model gains an additional activation and is allocated [1] Influence."

array.name: TetherBall
array.item: "Target free-ball is immediately placed in possession of this model."

array.name: TormentedAgony
array.item: "Target enemy model with at least [1] Influence loses [1] Influence. Choose an enemy model within [10\"] of this model that has not yet activated this turn, that model is allocated [1] Influence."

array.name: UnexpectedArrival
array.item: "Enemy models within the pulse suffer a [4\"] Push directly away from this model."

array.name: TheUnmasking
array.item: "All other models within the pulse suffer a [4\"] Push directly away from this model and [3] DMG."

array.name: ThousandCuts
array.item: "Target enemy model suffers [-2] DEF and [1] DMG"

array.name: TidalSurge
array.item: "Target model may make a [4\"] Dodge. If the target model is an enemy model, it is a friendly model during this action."

array.name: TooledUp
array.item: "Target friendly model gains [+1] DMG to Character Plays that cause damage and Playbook damage results."

array.name: TrueReplication
array.item: "Choose a Character Play on target friendly non-[Captain] Guild model\'s card and replace this Character Play with it for the rest of the turn."

array.name: Tucked
array.item: "If target enemy model has not activated this turn, it must be the next model the enemy team activates."

array.name: WakeTheDead
array.item: "Target friendly model gains Reanimate. (Once per turn when this model is reduced to [0] HP, before suffering the taken-out condition recover [3] HP and remove all conditions)."
